title: Champion information
body:
I thought it would be a good idea if Riot showed the amount of utility a champion offers. This would a bar next to their difficulty,attack, defense, and ability. It may help describe the champion that much more.

While on the topic it may also be beneficial to include the "effective CC performed" in the after game report to help players evaluate and improve their skills as a "peel/support/initiating" champion.

Just a thought.

Thank you

replies.body: Not to sound like that of an a jerk but they already do have something sort of like that and that is listing the champion as "support". Supports mostly offer a large amount of utility after all. But still your point if a very valid one. The information page needs to have a bit more added to it so we know more about the champion we are getting into.
Certainly doesn't make you seem like a jerk, thanks for the input. I figure there is no reason not to have more information. seems like nothing but better, keep up the good work Riot.
